channel.title: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained
channel.description:
Ok, so I hope someone is experienced with coding java and can make a code for me. I want if someone drinks beer (code 1917), he will do the animation (anim 2770) and if he walks, he will walk forward lik normal but with the emotion drunk walking (code 2769). Also the beer (code 1917) must turn into a glass (code 1919). I hope someone can make this code.
I am not experienced enough with java so I think it will be very very difficult for me to make this. And, can you also tell em where I need to add the code to?
Thanks ALOT if you help me with this!!!
- Refive

item.title: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained
item.dc:creator: @Refive Refive
item.description:
@Refive wrote:

It still says: “Cannot find symbol c.drunk”. There is something wrong with the “.” please help!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained

item.title: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained
item.dc:creator: @Refive Refive
item.description:
@Refive wrote:

[quote=“Atreyu1993, post:2, topic:427899”]Try these, this will be through commands, if this is how you want this to work, i will get the beer to work for you.

Add these commands if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Drunk")){ c.sendMessage("Your drunk!"); c.drunk = true; c.getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("undrunk")){ c.sendMessage("Your undrunk!");//Doesn't sound right, but who cares? c.drunk = false; c.getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

In your combatassistant, find your “getPlayerAnimIndex” void.

Add this statement in with the rest of them if(c.drunk){ c.playerWalkIndex = 2769; c.playerStandIndex = 2769; c.playerRunIndex = 2769; return; }

Also in your player class declare public boolean drunk;[/quote]

It says that there’s something wrong with the variable symbol “.” when I compile.

Coult not find symbol “c.drunk = true;”.
^ with an arrow to the “.”

Can you help me? Thanks! The rest of the code, thanks alot for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained

item.title: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

For the beer drinking.

Go to ClickItems.java

make a new statement something that replaces the beer with an empty glass

I’m not spoon feeding like that guy ^

item.title: Can someone make a "Drunk" code, I got the info I want explained
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

Try these, this will be through commands, if this is how you want this to work, i will get the beer to work for you.

Add these commands if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Drunk")){ c.sendMessage("Your drunk!"); c.drunk = true; c.getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("undrunk")){ c.sendMessage("Your undrunk!");//Doesn't sound right, but who cares? c.drunk = false; c.getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

In your combatassistant, find your “getPlayerAnimIndex” void.

Add this statement in with the rest of them if(c.drunk){ c.playerWalkIndex = 2769; c.playerStandIndex = 2769; c.playerRunIndex = 2769; return; }

Also in your player class declare public boolean drunk;

Read full topic
